name: Dots - first-person puzzle platformer
description:
A small puzzle platformer featuring simple gameplay and minimalistic voxel graphics.

Objective- find 3 dots to open a portal to the next level.

Controls

W,A,S,D - move

Space - jump

Left-click - shoot

Right-click - aim/silent sense

Q - play music

Tab - stop music

Alt-F4 - quit
